title: Magi: Sinbad no Bouken
synopsis: Not so long ago, mysterious structures called Dungeons began appearing all over the world. No one knows what they are or how they came to be, but adventurers and armies around the world instantly took interest in them. Thousands set out to explore the Dungeons, but so far, not a single person has returned.
related_anime: ['Magi: Sinbad no Bouken', 'Magi: Sinbad no Bouken (TV)']
voices: ['Ono, Daisuke', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Sakurai, Takahiro', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Fujiwara, Keiji', 'Konishi, Katsuyuki', 'Kayano, Ai', 'Kuno, Misaki', 'Koyasu, Takehito', 'Saitou, Souma']
